meanings.definition: A person who lives in a city.
meanings.sent1: The urbanite enjoyed the bustling streets of the city.
meanings.sent2: Many urbanites prefer the convenience of living close to work.
meanings.sent3: The urbanite chuckled at the thought of navigating the countryside.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of rural dwellers, the urbanite stood out like a skyscraper.
meanings.sent5: The urbanite's heart beat to the rhythm of the city's pulse.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a city.
meanings.sent1: The urbanite lifestyle often involves fast-paced living.
meanings.sent2: City planners consider various urbanite needs when designing infrastructure.
meanings.sent3: The urbanite squirrel seemed out of place among the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an urbanite jungle of thoughts and ideas.
meanings.sent5: The urbanite skyline glittered under the night sky.
